Button.TooltipReference: Press to take back all of your starting stat choices
Press to place as many points as possible into Strength
Press to place as many points as possible into Stamina
Press to place as many points as possible into Agility
Press to place as many points as possible into Dexterity
Press to place as many points as possible into Wisdom
Press to place as many points as possible into Intelligence
Press to place as many points as possible into Charisma
Press to have a random name chosen for you
Press to choose your character's appearance
